message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $9,500 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, however, I know the product's worth a bit more than that. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to go above $8,500 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
